name: Creating a Self-Driving Car Programmed To Chase My Labrador
description: A guide on how to create model car, powered by a Raspberry Pi Model 3B, to take action on visual stimuli. Written fully in Python using libraries: OpenCV|Face_Recognition and many more. Full details inside!

name: Football Matchday Summarizer - Built Using Enaml, QTPy
description: A desktop application to allow you to check all the pertinent football data from the top 4 European football leagues using the Football-Data.org API!

name: Filling In PDF Fields With Data Found In a .csv & Saving Copies using PyPDF2 and Pandas
description: If you have one pdf template with fillable fields, here's how to fill them all in and saving each as a copy, with data found in a .csv, all the while keeping the fields dynamic and editable!
